author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Virudhunagar Collector, V. Rajaraman, has asked all the 450 panchayats to conduct gram sabha meetings on Tuesday on the occasion of Republic Day.

In a statement, the Collector said the meetings would discuss the expenditure incurred on general fund in each of the panchayats till December 2015. Besides, the panchayat should place before the public the project reports for various development works to be taken up in the panchayat during 2016-17.

The statement added that the people should talk about sanitation, solid waste management and planning of Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme.

The functioning of self help groups, eradication of polio, removal of juli flora, preventive measures for breeding of mosquito that spreads dengue would be discussed by the villagers.

Besides, the villagers could discuss other issues related to the panchayat with the approval of the Panchayat President, the statement said.
title: Gram sabha on January 26
